column5: I will be heading up to Buckhorn (Deer Bay) next week to fish for walleye. Has anybody fished there recently. If so, how did you do? Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks.jb

I have not been to Buckhorn in a few years, but if its anything like the rest of Ontario, think deep and think night. We are in the midst of a terrible drought. But the beauty of Buckhorn is that it still would be able to produce in any condition. In front of the marina at night and at the narrows, there are a few boulders sticking out in the current are always good spots.
